name.en-NG: Pap (Akamu/Ogi) with Skimmed Milk and Fresh Fruits
name.fr-CI: Pap (Akamu/Ogi) avec Lait Écrémé et Fruits Frais
name.en-GH: Pap (Akamu/Ogi) with Skimmed Milk and Fresh Fruits
name.en-KE: Pap (Akamu/Ogi) with Skimmed Milk and Fresh Fruits
name.en-ZA: Pap (Akamu/Ogi) with Skimmed Milk and Fresh Fruits

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup pap (fermented maize) in 1 cup hot water until thick. Add 1/2 cup skimmed milk and top with 1/2 sliced banana and 1/4 cup diced pawpaw. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de pap (maïs fermenté) dans 1 tasse d'eau chaude jusqu'à épaississement. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de lait écrémé et garnissez de 1/2 banane tranchée et 1/4 tasse de papaye en dés. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook pap in hot water until thick. Add skimmed milk and top with banana and pawpaw. Serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Cook pap in hot water until thick. Add skimmed milk and top with banana and pawpaw. Serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook pap in hot water until thick. Add skimmed milk and top with banana and pawpaw. Serve warm.

name.en-NG: Moi Moi (Steamed Bean Pudding) with Boiled Eggs
name.fr-CI: Moi Moi (Pouding de Haricots Vapeur) avec Œufs Durs
name.en-GH: Moi Moi (Steamed Bean Pudding) with Boiled Eggs
name.en-KE: Moi Moi (Steamed Bean Pudding) with Boiled Eggs
name.en-ZA: Moi Moi (Steamed Bean Pudding) with Boiled Eggs

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 cup peeled beans, 1 red bell pepper, 1/2 onion, 1 tbsp oil, and seasonings. Steam mixture in ramekins for 45 minutes. Serve with 2 boiled eggs.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 tasse de haricots épluchés, 1 poivron rouge, 1/2 oignon, 1 càs d’huile et assaisonnements. Faites cuire à la vapeur 45 minutes. Servez avec 2 œufs durs.
preparation.en-GH: Blend beans with pepper, onion, oil, and seasoning. Steam for 45 minutes. Serve with boiled eggs.
preparation.en-KE: Blend beans with pepper, onion, oil, and seasoning. Steam for 45 minutes. Serve with boiled eggs.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend beans with pepper, onion, oil, and seasoning. Steam for 45 minutes. Serve with boiled eggs.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 2 cups diced yam with 2 cups water, 1 tomato, 1/2 onion, and spinach until yam is tender. Add 1 tsp palm oil (optional). Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 2 tasses d’igname en dés avec 2 tasses d’eau, 1 tomate, 1/2 oignon et épinards jusqu’à tendreté. Ajoutez 1 c. à c. d’huile de palme (optionnel). Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook yam with tomato, onion, and spinach until tender. Add palm oil if desired. Serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Cook yam with tomato, onion, and spinach until tender. Add palm oil if desired. Serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook yam with tomato, onion, and spinach until tender. Add palm oil if desired. Serve warm.

name.fr-CI: Banane Plantain Grillée avec Beurre d’Arachide

preparation.en-NG: Grill 1 medium ripe plantain for 8–10 minutes. Slice and spread 1 tbsp natural peanut butter. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Grillez 1 plantain mûr pendant 8–10 minutes. Coupez et tartinez 1 càs de beurre d’arachide naturel. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Grill plantain, slice, and spread peanut butter. Serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Grill plantain, slice, and spread peanut butter. Serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Grill plantain, slice, and spread peanut butter. Serve warm.

name.en-NG: Ofada Rice with Light Vegetable Sauce
name.fr-CI: Riz Ofada avec Sauce Légère aux Légumes
name.en-GH: Ofada Rice with Light Vegetable Sauce
name.en-KE: Ofada Rice with Light Vegetable Sauce
name.en-ZA: Ofada Rice with Light Vegetable Sauce

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1 cup ofada rice in 2 cups water until tender. Prepare sauce with 1 tomato, 1/2 onion, 1 tsp oil, and spinach. Serve together.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1 tasse de riz ofada dans 2 tasses d’eau jusqu’à tendreté. Préparez une sauce avec 1 tomate, 1/2 oignon, 1 c. à c. d’huile et épinards. Servez ensemble.
preparation.en-GH: Cook rice and serve with light vegetable sauce.
preparation.en-KE: Cook rice and serve with light vegetable sauce.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook rice and serve with light vegetable sauce.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 cup pineapple, 1/2 cup mango, 1 tsp ginger, and 1/2 cup cold water. Serve chilled.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 tasse d’ananas, 1/2 tasse de mangue, 1 c. à c. de gingembre et 1/2 tasse d’eau froide. Servez frais.
preparation.en-GH: Blend pineapple, mango, ginger, and water. Serve chilled.
preparation.en-KE: Blend pineapple, mango, ginger, and water. Serve chilled.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend pineapple, mango, ginger, and water. Serve chilled.

name.fr-CI: Crêpes de Haricots Cuites au Four (Alternative à l’Akara)

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 cup peeled beans, 1/2 onion, and spices. Pour batter into muffin tins. Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes until golden.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 tasse de haricots épluchés, 1/2 oignon et épices. Versez dans des moules à muffins. Cuisez au four 180°C pendant 25 minutes jusqu’à doré.
preparation.en-GH: Blend beans with onion and spices. Bake batter in muffin tins until golden.
preparation.en-KE: Blend beans with onion and spices. Bake batter in muffin tins until golden.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend beans with onion and spices. Bake batter in muffin tins until golden.

name.en-NG: Whole Wheat Egg Sandwich with Ugu Spinach
name.fr-CI: Sandwich de Blé Complet aux Œufs et Épinards Ugu
name.en-GH: Whole Wheat Egg Sandwich with Ugu Spinach
name.en-KE: Whole Wheat Egg Sandwich with Ugu Spinach
name.en-ZA: Whole Wheat Egg Sandwich with Ugu Spinach

preparation.en-NG: Scramble 2 eggs with ugu spinach. Place between 2 slices whole wheat bread. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Brouillez 2 œufs avec des épinards ugu. Placez entre 2 tranches de pain complet. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Scramble eggs with ugu spinach. Place between whole wheat bread slices. Serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Scramble eggs with ugu spinach. Place between whole wheat bread slices. Serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Scramble eggs with ugu spinach. Place between whole wheat bread slices. Serve warm.

name.en-NG: Millet Pap (Kunu) with Light Coconut Milk
name.fr-CI: Bouillie de Millet (Kunu) avec Lait de Coco Léger
name.en-GH: Millet Pap (Kunu) with Light Coconut Milk
name.en-KE: Millet Pap (Kunu) with Light Coconut Milk
name.en-ZA: Millet Pap (Kunu) with Light Coconut Milk

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup millet flour in 1 cup water until thick. Stir in 1/4 cup light coconut milk. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de farine de millet dans 1 tasse d’eau jusqu’à épaississement. Ajoutez 1/4 tasse de lait de coco léger. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook millet pap and stir in light coconut milk. Serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Cook millet pap and stir in light coconut milk. Serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook millet pap and stir in light coconut milk. Serve warm.

name.en-NG: Tropical Fruit Salad with Toasted Egusi Seeds
name.fr-CI: Salade de Fruits Tropicaux avec Graines d’Egusi Grillées
name.en-GH: Tropical Fruit Salad with Toasted Egusi Seeds
name.en-KE: Tropical Fruit Salad with Toasted Egusi Seeds
name.en-ZA: Tropical Fruit Salad with Toasted Egusi Seeds

preparation.en-NG: Mix 1/2 cup pineapple, 1/2 cup pawpaw, 1/2 banana, and 1/4 cup mango. Top with 2 tbsp toasted egusi seeds. Serve chilled.
preparation.fr-CI: Mélangez 1/2 tasse d’ananas, 1/2 tasse de papaye, 1/2 banane et 1/4 tasse de mangue. Garnissez de 2 càs de graines d’Egusi grillées. Servez frais.
preparation.en-GH: Combine pineapple, pawpaw, banana, and mango. Sprinkle with toasted egusi seeds.
preparation.en-KE: Combine pineapple, pawpaw, banana, and mango. Sprinkle with toasted egusi seeds.
preparation.en-ZA: Combine pineapple, pawpaw, banana, and mango. Sprinkle with toasted egusi seeds.

name.en-NG: Boiled Yam with Fresh Tomato Sauce
name.fr-CI: Igname Bouillie avec Sauce Tomate Fraîche
name.en-GH: Boiled Yam with Fresh Tomato Sauce
name.en-KE: Boiled Yam with Fresh Tomato Sauce
name.en-ZA: Boiled Yam with Fresh Tomato Sauce

preparation.en-NG: Boil 2 cups yam cubes in salted water until tender. Prepare sauce with 2 tomatoes, 1/2 onion, 1 tsp oil. Serve hot.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites bouillir 2 tasses d’igname en cubes dans de l’eau salée. Préparez une sauce avec 2 tomates, 1/2 oignon, 1 c. à c. d’huile. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Boil yam and serve with fresh tomato sauce.
preparation.en-KE: Boil yam and serve with fresh tomato sauce.
preparation.en-ZA: Boil yam and serve with fresh tomato sauce.

name.en-NG: Oven-Baked Banana with Cinnamon and Honey
name.fr-CI: Banane au Four avec Cannelle et Miel
name.en-GH: Oven-Baked Banana with Cinnamon and Honey
name.en-KE: Oven-Baked Banana with Cinnamon and Honey
name.en-ZA: Oven-Baked Banana with Cinnamon and Honey

preparation.en-NG: Slice 2 bananas. Sprinkle with 1/2 tsp cinnamon and drizzle 1 tsp honey. Bake at 180°C for 12 minutes. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Coupez 2 bananes. Saupoudrez de 1/2 c. à c. de cannelle et arrosez de 1 c. à c. de miel. Cuisez au four 180°C pendant 12 minutes. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Slice bananas, sprinkle cinnamon, drizzle honey, and bake.
preparation.en-KE: Slice bananas, sprinkle cinnamon, drizzle honey, and bake.
preparation.en-ZA: Slice bananas, sprinkle cinnamon, drizzle honey, and bake.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup oats in 1 cup water. Add 1/4 cup diced African mango. Top with 1 tsp chopped cashew. Serve hot.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse d’avoine dans 1 tasse d’eau. Ajoutez 1/4 tasse de mangue africaine en dés. Garnissez de 1 c. à c. de noix de cajou hachées. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook oats, add African mango, top with cashew.
preparation.en-KE: Cook oats, add African mango, top with cashew.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook oats, add African mango, top with cashew.

name.en-NG: Light Egusi Soup with Eba Balls
name.fr-CI: Soupe d’Egusi Légère avec Boulettes d’Eba
name.en-GH: Light Egusi Soup with Eba Balls
name.en-KE: Light Egusi Soup with Eba Balls
name.en-ZA: Light Egusi Soup with Eba Balls

preparation.en-NG: Cook 2 tbsp ground egusi with 1 tomato, 1/2 onion, 1 tsp oil, and spinach. Serve with 1/2 cup small eba balls (cassava flour).
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 2 càs d’Egusi moulu avec 1 tomate, 1/2 oignon, 1 c. à c. d’huile et épinards. Servez avec 1/2 tasse de petites boules d’eba (farine de manioc).
preparation.en-GH: Cook egusi with tomato, onion, spinach. Serve with eba balls.
preparation.en-KE: Cook egusi with tomato, onion, spinach. Serve with eba balls.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook egusi with tomato, onion, spinach. Serve with eba balls.

name.en-NG: Sweet Potato Amala with Vegetable Sauce
name.fr-CI: Amala de Patate Douce avec Sauce de Légumes
name.en-GH: Sweet Potato Amala with Vegetable Sauce
name.en-KE: Sweet Potato Amala with Vegetable Sauce
name.en-ZA: Sweet Potato Amala with Vegetable Sauce

preparation.en-NG: Mix 1/2 cup sweet potato flour with hot water to make amala. Serve with sauce made from 1 tomato, 1/2 onion, and spinach.
preparation.fr-CI: Mélangez 1/2 tasse de farine de patate douce avec de l’eau chaude pour faire l’amala. Servez avec une sauce faite de 1 tomate, 1/2 oignon et épinards.
preparation.en-GH: Prepare amala with sweet potato flour. Serve with light vegetable sauce.
preparation.en-KE: Prepare amala with sweet potato flour. Serve with light vegetable sauce.
preparation.en-ZA: Prepare amala with sweet potato flour. Serve with light vegetable sauce.

name.en-NG: Nigerian Whole Wheat Bread with Avocado
name.en-GH: Nigerian Whole Wheat Bread with Avocado
name.en-KE: Nigerian Whole Wheat Bread with Avocado
name.en-ZA: Nigerian Whole Wheat Bread with Avocado

preparation.en-NG: Toast 2 slices whole wheat Nigerian bread. Mash 1/2 avocado with lemon and spread on bread. Serve fresh.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites griller 2 tranches de pain nigérian complet. Écrasez 1/2 avocat avec du citron et tartinez sur le pain. Servez frais.
preparation.en-GH: Toast bread, mash avocado, spread on bread.
preparation.en-KE: Toast bread, mash avocado, spread on bread.
preparation.en-ZA: Toast bread, mash avocado, spread on bread.

name.en-NG: Masa (Rice Flatbread) with Light Tomato Dip
name.fr-CI: Masa (Galette de Riz) avec Sauce Tomate Légère
name.en-GH: Masa (Rice Flatbread) with Light Tomato Dip
name.en-KE: Masa (Rice Flatbread) with Light Tomato Dip
name.en-ZA: Masa (Rice Flatbread) with Light Tomato Dip

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 cup soaked rice with 1/4 onion. Cook batter in greased pan until golden. Serve with tomato dip (1 tomato, 1/4 onion, seasoning).
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 tasse de riz trempé avec 1/4 oignon. Faites cuire la pâte dans une poêle graissée jusqu’à doré. Servez avec sauce tomate (1 tomate, 1/4 oignon, assaisonnement).
preparation.en-GH: Blend rice, cook flatbread, and serve with tomato dip.
preparation.en-KE: Blend rice, cook flatbread, and serve with tomato dip.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend rice, cook flatbread, and serve with tomato dip.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup quinoa in 1 cup water. Prepare light egusi sauce with 1 tbsp ground egusi, tomato, onion, and spinach. Serve together.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de quinoa dans 1 tasse d’eau. Préparez une sauce légère d’Egusi avec 1 càs d’Egusi moulu, tomate, oignon et épinards. Servez ensemble.
preparation.en-GH: Cook quinoa and serve with light egusi sauce.
preparation.en-KE: Cook quinoa and serve with light egusi sauce.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook quinoa and serve with light egusi sauce.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1 cup beans until soft. Add 1/2 cup fresh corn, 1 tomato, 1/2 onion, and a pinch of salt. Simmer 10 mins. Serve hot.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1 tasse de haricots jusqu’à tendres. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de maïs frais, 1 tomate, 1/2 oignon et une pincée de sel. Laissez mijoter 10 min. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook beans, add corn, tomato, onion, and simmer.
preparation.en-KE: Cook beans, add corn, tomato, onion, and simmer.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook beans, add corn, tomato, onion, and simmer.

preparation.en-NG: Prepare 1 cup pap (ogi) with hot water. Add 1 tbsp groundnut paste and 1/4 cup low-fat milk. Stir and serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Préparez 1 tasse de bouillie (ogi) avec de l’eau chaude. Ajoutez 1 càs de pâte d’arachide et 1/4 tasse de lait écrémé. Remuez et servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Make pap, mix with groundnut paste and milk.
preparation.en-KE: Make pap, mix with groundnut paste and milk.
preparation.en-ZA: Make pap, mix with groundnut paste and milk.

name.fr-CI: Moi Moi Farci à la Sardine

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 cup peeled beans with pepper, onion, and seasoning. Add 1 tbsp mashed sardine. Steam in ramekin for 40 mins. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 tasse de haricots épluchés avec du piment, oignon et assaisonnement. Ajoutez 1 càs de sardine écrasée. Cuisez à la vapeur 40 min. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Blend beans, add sardine, steam until cooked.
preparation.en-KE: Blend beans, add sardine, steam until cooked.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend beans, add sardine, steam until cooked.

name.fr-CI: Bouillie de Patate Douce avec Ugu

preparation.en-NG: Cook 2 cups diced sweet potato with onion, tomato, and seasoning. Add chopped ugu leaves at the end. Serve hot.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 2 tasses de patate douce en dés avec oignon, tomate et assaisonnement. Ajoutez les feuilles d’ugu hachées en fin de cuisson. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook sweet potato with veggies, add ugu leaves.
preparation.en-KE: Cook sweet potato with veggies, add ugu leaves.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook sweet potato with veggies, add ugu leaves.

preparation.en-NG: Prepare 1 cup akamu with hot water. Add 1/2 cup tigernut milk. Sweeten with honey if desired.
preparation.fr-CI: Préparez 1 tasse d’akamu avec de l’eau chaude. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de lait de souchet. Sucrez avec du miel si désiré.
preparation.en-GH: Make akamu and add tigernut milk.
preparation.en-KE: Make akamu and add tigernut milk.
preparation.en-ZA: Make akamu and add tigernut milk.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup millet flour with 1 cup water. Add 2 chopped dates for sweetness. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de farine de mil avec 1 tasse d’eau. Ajoutez 2 dattes hachées pour sucrer. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook millet pap and add chopped dates.
preparation.en-KE: Cook millet pap and add chopped dates.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook millet pap and add chopped dates.

name.fr-CI: Bouillie de Riz Brun avec Papaye

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup brown rice in water until soft. Add 1/4 cup diced papaya and 1 tsp honey. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de riz brun dans l’eau jusqu’à tendre. Ajoutez 1/4 tasse de papaye en dés et 1 c. à c. de miel. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook brown rice, add papaya and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Cook brown rice, add papaya and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook brown rice, add papaya and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 2 cups yam cubes. Prepare stew with 1 cup diced eggplant, tomato, onion, and 1 tsp oil. Serve together.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 2 tasses d’igname en cubes. Préparez un ragoût avec 1 tasse d’aubergine en dés, tomate, oignon et 1 c. à c. d’huile. Servez ensemble.
preparation.en-GH: Cook yam and serve with eggplant stew.
preparation.en-KE: Cook yam and serve with eggplant stew.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook yam and serve with eggplant stew.

name.fr-CI: Toast à l’Avocat avec Épices Suya

preparation.en-NG: Toast 2 slices bread. Mash 1/2 avocado, sprinkle 1 tsp suya spice, and spread on bread. Serve fresh.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites griller 2 tranches de pain. Écrasez 1/2 avocat, saupoudrez 1 c. à c. d’épices suya et tartinez sur le pain. Servez frais.
preparation.en-GH: Toast bread, add avocado with suya spice.
preparation.en-KE: Toast bread, add avocado with suya spice.
preparation.en-ZA: Toast bread, add avocado with suya spice.

preparation.en-NG: Cube 150g tofu. Stir-fry with 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrot, green beans, bell pepper) and 1 tsp olive oil. Season with pinch of salt and serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Coupez 150g de tofu en dés. Faites sauter avec 1 tasse de légumes mélangés (carotte, haricots verts, poivron) et 1 c. à c. d’huile d’olive. Assaisonnez et servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cube tofu, stir-fry with vegetables, season and serve.
preparation.en-KE: Cube tofu, stir-fry with vegetables, season and serve.
preparation.en-ZA: Cube tofu, stir-fry with vegetables, season and serve.

name.fr-CI: Toast de Patate Douce avec Œuf

preparation.en-NG: Slice 1 medium sweet potato into thin slices. Bake until tender. Top with 1 boiled egg, sliced, and season with pepper.
preparation.fr-CI: Tranchez 1 patate douce moyenne. Faites cuire au four jusqu’à tendre. Garnissez avec 1 œuf bouilli tranché et assaisonnez.
preparation.en-GH: Bake sweet potato slices, top with egg.
preparation.en-KE: Bake sweet potato slices, top with egg.
preparation.en-ZA: Bake sweet potato slices, top with egg.

name.fr-CI: Bouillie de Semoule de Maïs au Lait de Coco

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup cornmeal in 2 cups water until thick. Stir in 1/2 cup coconut milk and sweeten with 1 tsp honey.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de semoule de maïs dans 2 tasses d’eau. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de lait de coco et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook cornmeal, add coconut milk and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Cook cornmeal, add coconut milk and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook cornmeal, add coconut milk and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Beat 3 eggs with 1/2 cup diced vegetables (tomato, bell pepper, spinach). Cook in skillet with 1 tsp olive oil until firm.
preparation.fr-CI: Battez 3 œufs avec 1/2 tasse de légumes en dés. Faites cuire dans une poêle avec 1 c. à c. d’huile d’olive jusqu’à ferme.
preparation.en-GH: Beat eggs with vegetables, cook in skillet.
preparation.en-KE: Beat eggs with vegetables, cook in skillet.
preparation.en-ZA: Beat eggs with vegetables, cook in skillet.

name.fr-CI: Crêpes à la Farine de Haricots

preparation.en-NG: Mix 1 cup bean flour with 1 egg, 1/4 cup water, and seasonings. Fry small pancakes with 1 tsp oil until golden.
preparation.fr-CI: Mélangez 1 tasse de farine de haricots avec 1 œuf, 1/4 tasse d’eau et assaisonnements. Faites frire en petites crêpes avec 1 c. à c. d’huile.
preparation.en-GH: Mix bean flour with egg and fry small pancakes.
preparation.en-KE: Mix bean flour with egg and fry small pancakes.
preparation.en-ZA: Mix bean flour with egg and fry small pancakes.

preparation.en-NG: Dice 1 cup yam and boil until soft. Fry lightly with 1/2 cup chopped vegetables (tomato, spinach, onion) using 1 tsp oil.
preparation.fr-CI: Coupez 1 tasse d’igname et faites bouillir. Faites revenir avec 1/2 tasse de légumes hachés en utilisant 1 c. à c. d’huile.
preparation.en-GH: Boil yam, fry with vegetables.
preparation.en-KE: Boil yam, fry with vegetables.
preparation.en-ZA: Boil yam, fry with vegetables.

preparation.en-NG: Mix 1 mashed banana with 1/2 cup oats, 1 egg, and 1 tsp honey. Bake in muffin tins at 180°C for 20 mins.
preparation.fr-CI: Mélangez 1 banane écrasée avec 1/2 tasse d’avoine, 1 œuf et 1 c. à c. de miel. Faites cuire à 180°C pendant 20 min.
preparation.en-GH: Mix banana, oats, egg, bake as muffins.
preparation.en-KE: Mix banana, oats, egg, bake as muffins.
preparation.en-ZA: Mix banana, oats, egg, bake as muffins.

name.fr-CI: Pudding de Chia à la Banane Plantain

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 ripe plantain with 1/4 cup chia seeds and 1 cup milk. Chill 4 hours until thick. Serve cold.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 plantain mûr avec 1/4 tasse de graines de chia et 1 tasse de lait. Réfrigérez 4h. Servez froid.
preparation.en-GH: Blend plantain, chia seeds, milk, chill.
preparation.en-KE: Blend plantain, chia seeds, milk, chill.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend plantain, chia seeds, milk, chill.

preparation.en-NG: Simmer 200g fresh fish with pepper, onion, garlic, ginger, and light spices in 3 cups water for 20 mins. Serve hot.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites mijoter 200g de poisson frais avec piment, oignon, ail, gingembre et épices dans 3 tasses d’eau pendant 20 min. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Simmer fish with pepper and spices in water.
preparation.en-KE: Simmer fish with pepper and spices in water.
preparation.en-ZA: Simmer fish with pepper and spices in water.

name.fr-CI: Toast à l’Avocat avec Feuilles d’Ugu

preparation.en-NG: Toast 2 slices whole grain bread. Mash 1/2 avocado and spread on toast. Top with 1/4 cup chopped ugu leaves and sprinkle black pepper.
preparation.fr-CI: Grillez 2 tranches de pain complet. Écrasez 1/2 avocat et étalez sur le pain. Ajoutez 1/4 tasse de feuilles d’ugu hachées et poivrez.
preparation.en-GH: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with ugu leaves.
preparation.en-KE: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with ugu leaves.
preparation.en-ZA: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with ugu leaves.

name.fr-CI: Gruau à Lait de Noix Tigrées

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup oats in 1 cup tigernut milk for 5 mins. Sweeten with 1 tsp honey and top with sliced banana.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse d’avoine dans 1 tasse de lait de noix tigrées pendant 5 min. Ajoutez 1 c. à c. de miel et des tranches de banane.
preparation.en-GH: Cook oats in tigernut milk, add honey and banana.
preparation.en-KE: Cook oats in tigernut milk, add honey and banana.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook oats in tigernut milk, add honey and banana.

preparation.en-NG: Boil 1/2 cup millet in 2 cups water until soft. Add 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 tsp ginger powder, and 1 tsp honey. Stir well.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de mil dans 2 tasses d’eau. Ajoutez 1/2 c. à c. de cannelle, 1/4 c. à c. de gingembre en poudre et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook millet, add spices and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Cook millet, add spices and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook millet, add spices and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1 cup chopped eggplant with tomato, onion, and garlic in 1 tsp oil until tender. Serve with 2 slices whole grain toast.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1 tasse d’aubergine avec tomate, oignon et ail dans 1 c. à c. d’huile. Servez avec 2 tranches de pain complet grillé.
preparation.en-GH: Cook eggplant stew, serve with toast.
preparation.en-KE: Cook eggplant stew, serve with toast.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook eggplant stew, serve with toast.

name.fr-CI: Soupe Légère de Gombo avec Poisson

preparation.en-NG: Simmer 200g fish with 1 cup sliced okra, onion, and pepper in 2 cups water for 15 mins. Serve hot.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites mijoter 200g de poisson avec 1 tasse de gombo, oignon et piment dans 2 tasses d’eau pendant 15 min. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Simmer fish with okra and spices.
preparation.en-KE: Simmer fish with okra and spices.
preparation.en-ZA: Simmer fish with okra and spices.

preparation.en-NG: Mix 1/4 cup chia seeds with 1 cup coconut milk. Chill overnight. Layer with diced pineapple and mango before serving.
preparation.fr-CI: Mélangez 1/4 tasse de graines de chia avec 1 tasse de lait de coco. Réfrigérez toute la nuit. Ajoutez ananas et mangue en dés.
preparation.en-GH: Mix chia with coconut milk, chill, add fruit.
preparation.en-KE: Mix chia with coconut milk, chill, add fruit.
preparation.en-ZA: Mix chia with coconut milk, chill, add fruit.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 cup peeled beans with pepper, onion, and 1 tbsp oil. Pour into ramekin, add 1 boiled egg, steam for 40 mins.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 tasse de haricots épluchés avec piment, oignon et 1 c. à s. d’huile. Versez dans un moule, ajoutez 1 œuf bouilli et cuisez à la vapeur 40 min.
preparation.en-GH: Blend beans, add egg, steam until set.
preparation.en-KE: Blend beans, add egg, steam until set.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend beans, add egg, steam until set.

name.fr-CI: Salade de Fruits Tropicaux aux Arachides

preparation.en-NG: Mix diced pineapple, mango, banana, and papaya (2 cups total). Sprinkle 2 tbsp roasted peanuts on top before serving.
preparation.fr-CI: Mélangez ananas, mangue, banane et papaye (2 tasses). Ajoutez 2 c. à s. d’arachides grillées sur le dessus.
preparation.en-GH: Mix tropical fruits, add peanuts.
preparation.en-KE: Mix tropical fruits, add peanuts.
preparation.en-ZA: Mix tropical fruits, add peanuts.

preparation.en-NG: Mash 100g smoked fish with 1 tsp olive oil and onion. Spread on 2 slices of toasted bread.
preparation.fr-CI: Écrasez 100g de poisson fumé avec 1 c. à c. d’huile d’olive et oignon. Étalez sur 2 tranches de pain grillé.
preparation.en-GH: Mash smoked fish, spread on toast.
preparation.en-KE: Mash smoked fish, spread on toast.
preparation.en-ZA: Mash smoked fish, spread on toast.

preparation.en-NG: Boil 1 cup diced yam until tender. Mash with 1/2 avocado and season with lemon juice and black pepper.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites bouillir 1 tasse d’igname en dés. Écrasez avec 1/2 avocat et assaisonnez avec jus de citron et poivre.
preparation.en-GH: Boil yam, mash with avocado, season.
preparation.en-KE: Boil yam, mash with avocado, season.
preparation.en-ZA: Boil yam, mash with avocado, season.

preparation.en-NG: Slice 1/2 ripe plantain and sauté in 1 tsp oil. Beat 2 eggs, pour over plantain, cook until firm.
preparation.fr-CI: Tranchez 1/2 plantain mûr et faites sauter dans 1 c. à c. d’huile. Battez 2 œufs, versez et cuisez jusqu’à ferme.
preparation.en-GH: Sauté plantain, add eggs, cook omelette.
preparation.en-KE: Sauté plantain, add eggs, cook omelette.
preparation.en-ZA: Sauté plantain, add eggs, cook omelette.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1/2 cup soaked tigernuts with 1 banana, 1 cup water, and 1 tsp honey until smooth.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1/2 tasse de noix tigrées trempées avec 1 banane, 1 tasse d’eau et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Blend tigernuts, banana, water, honey.
preparation.en-KE: Blend tigernuts, banana, water, honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend tigernuts, banana, water, honey.

preparation.en-NG: Sauté 1 cup shredded cabbage in 1 tsp oil. Add 2 beaten eggs and cook until scrambled together.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites sauter 1 tasse de chou dans 1 c. à c. d’huile. Ajoutez 2 œufs battus et brouillez.
preparation.en-GH: Sauté cabbage, add eggs, scramble.
preparation.en-KE: Sauté cabbage, add eggs, scramble.
preparation.en-ZA: Sauté cabbage, add eggs, scramble.

preparation.en-NG: Layer 1/2 cup diced pawpaw with 1/2 cup plain yogurt and 1/4 cup granola in a glass.
preparation.fr-CI: Alternez 1/2 tasse de papaye en dés avec 1/2 tasse de yaourt nature et 1/4 tasse de granola.
preparation.en-GH: Layer pawpaw, yogurt, granola.
preparation.en-KE: Layer pawpaw, yogurt, granola.
preparation.en-ZA: Layer pawpaw, yogurt, granola.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 banana, 1 tsp moringa powder, 1/2 cup spinach, and 1 cup water until smooth.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 banane, 1 c. à c. de poudre de moringa, 1/2 tasse d’épinards et 1 tasse d’eau.
preparation.en-GH: Blend banana, moringa, spinach, water.
preparation.en-KE: Blend banana, moringa, spinach, water.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend banana, moringa, spinach, water.

preparation.en-NG: Grate 1 cup yam, mix with 1 egg and 2 tbsp flour. Fry small pancakes in 1 tsp oil until golden.
preparation.fr-CI: Râpez 1 tasse d’igname, mélangez avec 1 œuf et 2 c. à s. de farine. Faites cuire en petites crêpes avec 1 c. à c. d’huile.
preparation.en-GH: Mix yam with egg, fry pancakes.
preparation.en-KE: Mix yam with egg, fry pancakes.
preparation.en-ZA: Mix yam with egg, fry pancakes.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup fermented maize pap. Stir in 2 tbsp groundnut paste and 1 tsp honey.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de bouillie de maïs fermenté. Ajoutez 2 c. à s. de pâte d’arachide et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook pap, stir in peanut paste and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Cook pap, stir in peanut paste and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook pap, stir in peanut paste and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Fill 1 whole wheat tortilla with 2 scrambled eggs and 1/2 sliced avocado. Roll and serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Garnissez 1 tortilla de blé complet avec 2 œufs brouillés et 1/2 avocat tranché. Roulez et servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Fill tortilla with eggs and avocado.
preparation.en-KE: Fill tortilla with eggs and avocado.
preparation.en-ZA: Fill tortilla with eggs and avocado.

name.fr-CI: Hash de Patates Douces avec Œufs

preparation.en-NG: Dice 1 cup sweet potatoes and sauté in 1 tsp oil until tender. Add 2 eggs and cook until desired firmness.
preparation.fr-CI: Coupez 1 tasse de patates douces en dés, faites sauter avec 1 c. à c. d’huile. Ajoutez 2 œufs et cuisez selon la texture voulue.
preparation.en-GH: Cook diced sweet potatoes, add eggs, finish together.
preparation.en-KE: Cook diced sweet potatoes, add eggs, finish together.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook diced sweet potatoes, add eggs, finish together.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup maize pap with water. Stir in 1/4 cup coconut milk and 1 tsp honey.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de bouillie de maïs. Ajoutez 1/4 tasse de lait de coco et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook pap, stir in coconut milk and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Cook pap, stir in coconut milk and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook pap, stir in coconut milk and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Slice 1/2 cup okra and sauté in 1 tsp oil. Add 2 beaten eggs and scramble until cooked.
preparation.fr-CI: Tranchez 1/2 tasse de gombo et faites sauter dans 1 c. à c. d’huile. Ajoutez 2 œufs battus et brouillez.
preparation.en-GH: Sauté okra, add eggs, scramble.
preparation.en-KE: Sauté okra, add eggs, scramble.
preparation.en-ZA: Sauté okra, add eggs, scramble.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup pap. Mash 1 ripe banana and stir into pap with 1 tsp honey.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de bouillie. Écrasez 1 banane mûre et ajoutez avec 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook pap, mash banana, stir together.
preparation.en-KE: Cook pap, mash banana, stir together.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook pap, mash banana, stir together.

preparation.en-NG: Spread 1/4 cup mashed sardines on 2 slices whole wheat toast. Sprinkle with parsley.
preparation.fr-CI: Étalez 1/4 tasse de sardines écrasées sur 2 tranches de pain complet. Parsemez de persil.
preparation.en-GH: Spread sardines on toast, garnish with parsley.
preparation.en-KE: Spread sardines on toast, garnish with parsley.
preparation.en-ZA: Spread sardines on toast, garnish with parsley.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup millet in 1 cup water. Stir in 1/2 avocado mashed with salt and pepper.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de mil dans 1 tasse d’eau. Ajoutez 1/2 avocat écrasé avec sel et poivre.
preparation.en-GH: Cook millet, stir in mashed avocado.
preparation.en-KE: Cook millet, stir in mashed avocado.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook millet, stir in mashed avocado.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 cup papaya chunks with 1/2 cup yogurt and 1 tsp honey until smooth.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 tasse de papaye en morceaux avec 1/2 tasse de yaourt et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Blend papaya, yogurt, honey.
preparation.en-KE: Blend papaya, yogurt, honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend papaya, yogurt, honey.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup sorghum flour with 1 cup water until thick. Sweeten with 1 tsp honey.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de farine de sorgho avec 1 tasse d’eau. Sucrez avec 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook sorghum porridge, sweeten lightly.
preparation.en-KE: Cook sorghum porridge, sweeten lightly.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook sorghum porridge, sweeten lightly.

preparation.en-NG: Top 2 slices whole wheat toast with 1/2 cup sautéed bell peppers and onions, plus 1 tbsp cheese.
preparation.fr-CI: Garnissez 2 tranches de pain complet avec 1/2 tasse de poivrons et oignons sautés, plus 1 c. à s. de fromage.
preparation.en-GH: Toast topped with sautéed vegetables and cheese.
preparation.en-KE: Toast topped with sautéed vegetables and cheese.
preparation.en-ZA: Toast topped with sautéed vegetables and cheese.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup oats in 1 cup tigernut milk. Stir in 1/4 tsp cayenne, 1 tsp honey, and top with banana slices.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse d’avoine dans 1 tasse de lait de noix tigrées. Ajoutez 1/4 c. à c. de piment, 1 c. à c. de miel et des tranches de banane.
preparation.en-GH: Cook oats with tigernut milk, add spice and banana.
preparation.en-KE: Cook oats with tigernut milk, add spice and banana.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook oats with tigernut milk, add spice and banana.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 cup peeled beans with 1/4 cup diced carrots, 1/4 cup bell pepper, 1 tbsp oil. Steam in ramekin 40 mins.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 tasse de haricots épluchés avec 1/4 tasse de carottes, 1/4 tasse de poivron et 1 c. à s. d’huile. Cuisez à la vapeur 40 min.
preparation.en-GH: Blend beans and vegetables, steam until set.
preparation.en-KE: Blend beans and vegetables, steam until set.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend beans and vegetables, steam until set.

preparation.en-NG: Grate 1 cup sweet potato, mix with 1 egg and 2 tbsp flour. Fry in 1 tsp oil until golden brown.
preparation.fr-CI: Râpez 1 tasse de patates douces, mélangez avec 1 œuf et 2 c. à s. de farine. Faites frire avec 1 c. à c. d’huile.
preparation.en-GH: Mix grated sweet potato with egg and flour, fry pancakes.
preparation.en-KE: Mix grated sweet potato with egg and flour, fry pancakes.
preparation.en-ZA: Mix grated sweet potato with egg and flour, fry pancakes.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup oats in water, stir in 1/2 cup diced pawpaw and 1 tsp honey. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse d’avoine dans l’eau, ajoutez 1/2 tasse de papaye en dés et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook oats, stir in pawpaw and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Cook oats, stir in pawpaw and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook oats, stir in pawpaw and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup maize pap with 1 cup water. Stir in 1 tsp moringa powder and 1 tsp honey.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de bouillie de maïs avec 1 tasse d’eau. Ajoutez 1 c. à c. de poudre de moringa et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook pap, add moringa powder and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Cook pap, add moringa powder and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook pap, add moringa powder and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Sauté 1 cup diced eggplant in 1 tsp oil. Serve on 2 slices whole wheat toast with a pinch of black pepper.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites sauter 1 tasse d’aubergine en dés avec 1 c. à c. d’huile. Servez sur 2 tranches de pain complet avec du poivre.
preparation.en-GH: Sauté eggplant, serve on toast.
preparation.en-KE: Sauté eggplant, serve on toast.
preparation.en-ZA: Sauté eggplant, serve on toast.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup oats in 1 cup water. Stir in 2 tbsp groundnut paste and 1 tsp honey. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse d’avoine dans 1 tasse d’eau. Ajoutez 2 c. à s. de pâte d’arachide et 1 c. à c. de miel. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook oats, stir in groundnut paste and honey, serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Cook oats, stir in groundnut paste and honey, serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook oats, stir in groundnut paste and honey, serve warm.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1/2 avocado, 1/2 cup diced mango, 1/2 cup yogurt, and 1 tsp honey until smooth.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1/2 avocat, 1/2 tasse de mangue en dés, 1/2 tasse de yaourt et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Blend avocado, mango, yogurt, honey until smooth.
preparation.en-KE: Blend avocado, mango, yogurt, honey until smooth.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend avocado, mango, yogurt, honey until smooth.

preparation.en-NG: Boil 1 ripe plantain and 2 eggs. Peel and slice plantain, serve with sliced boiled eggs and a pinch of salt.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites bouillir 1 plantain mûr et 2 œufs. Épluchez et tranchez le plantain, servez avec les œufs durs tranchés et une pincée de sel.
preparation.en-GH: Boil plantain and eggs, serve sliced with salt.
preparation.en-KE: Boil plantain and eggs, serve sliced with salt.
preparation.en-ZA: Boil plantain and eggs, serve sliced with salt.

preparation.en-NG: Sauté 1/2 cup spinach in 1 tsp oil. Scramble 2 eggs and wrap with spinach in a whole wheat tortilla.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites sauter 1/2 tasse d’épinards dans 1 c. à c. d’huile. Brouillez 2 œufs et enveloppez avec les épinards dans une tortilla de blé complet.
preparation.en-GH: Sauté spinach, scramble eggs, wrap in tortilla.
preparation.en-KE: Sauté spinach, scramble eggs, wrap in tortilla.
preparation.en-ZA: Sauté spinach, scramble eggs, wrap in tortilla.

name.fr-CI: Bouillie de Mil à la Mangue

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup millet with 1 cup water. Stir in 1/2 cup diced mango and 1 tsp honey.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de mil avec 1 tasse d’eau. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de mangue en dés et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Cook millet, stir in mango and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Cook millet, stir in mango and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook millet, stir in mango and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Toast 2 slices whole wheat bread. Sauté 1/2 cup diced tomatoes and scramble 2 eggs. Serve on toast.
preparation.fr-CI: Toastez 2 tranches de pain complet. Faites sauter 1/2 tasse de tomates en dés et brouillez 2 œufs. Servez sur le toast.
preparation.en-GH: Toast bread, sauté tomatoes, scramble eggs, serve together.
preparation.en-KE: Toast bread, sauté tomatoes, scramble eggs, serve together.
preparation.en-ZA: Toast bread, sauté tomatoes, scramble eggs, serve together.

name.fr-CI: Toast Beurre de Cacahuète et Banane

preparation.en-NG: Toast 2 slices whole wheat bread. Spread 2 tbsp peanut butter and top with 1 sliced banana.
preparation.fr-CI: Toastez 2 tranches de pain complet. Étalez 2 c. à s. de beurre de cacahuète et ajoutez 1 banane tranchée.
preparation.en-GH: Toast bread, spread peanut butter, top with banana slices.
preparation.en-KE: Toast bread, spread peanut butter, top with banana slices.
preparation.en-ZA: Toast bread, spread peanut butter, top with banana slices.

name.fr-CI: Œufs Brouillés au Gombo et Tomate

preparation.en-NG: Sauté 1/2 cup sliced okra and 1/2 cup diced tomatoes in 1 tsp oil. Add 2 beaten eggs and scramble until cooked.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites sauter 1/2 tasse de gombo tranché et 1/2 tasse de tomates en dés dans 1 c. à c. d’huile. Ajoutez 2 œufs battus et brouillez.
preparation.en-GH: Sauté okra and tomatoes, scramble eggs, serve hot.
preparation.en-KE: Sauté okra and tomatoes, scramble eggs, serve hot.
preparation.en-ZA: Sauté okra and tomatoes, scramble eggs, serve hot.

preparation.en-NG: Layer 1/2 cup yogurt with 1/2 cup diced mango and 2 tbsp granola in a glass. Chill for 5 minutes before serving.
preparation.fr-CI: Alternez 1/2 tasse de yaourt avec 1/2 tasse de mangue en dés et 2 c. à s. de granola dans un verre. Réfrigérez 5 minutes avant de servir.
preparation.en-GH: Layer yogurt, mango, granola, serve chilled.
preparation.en-KE: Layer yogurt, mango, granola, serve chilled.
preparation.en-ZA: Layer yogurt, mango, granola, serve chilled.

name.fr-CI: Œufs Brouillés avec Plantain et Poivron

preparation.en-NG: Fry 1/2 cup diced plantain and 1/4 cup diced bell pepper in 1 tsp oil. Add 2 beaten eggs and scramble until cooked.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites frire 1/2 tasse de plantain en dés et 1/4 tasse de poivron en dés dans 1 c. à c. d’huile. Ajoutez 2 œufs battus et brouillez.
preparation.en-GH: Fry plantain and peppers, scramble eggs, serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Fry plantain and peppers, scramble eggs, serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Fry plantain and peppers, scramble eggs, serve warm.

preparation.en-NG: Toast 2 slices whole wheat bread. Mash 1/2 avocado and spread on toast. Top with 2 fried eggs and sprinkle with black pepper.
preparation.fr-CI: Toastez 2 tranches de pain complet. Écrasez 1/2 avocat et étalez sur le toast. Ajoutez 2 œufs frits et saupoudrez de poivre.
preparation.en-GH: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with fried eggs, season.
preparation.en-KE: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with fried eggs, season.
preparation.en-ZA: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with fried eggs, season.

name.fr-CI: Pudding de Chia à la Mangue

preparation.en-NG: Mix 3 tbsp chia seeds with 1/2 cup almond milk. Refrigerate 4 hrs. Top with 1/2 cup diced mango before serving.
preparation.fr-CI: Mélangez 3 c. à s. de graines de chia avec 1/2 tasse de lait d’amande. Réfrigérez 4 h. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de mangue en dés avant de servir.
preparation.en-GH: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, refrigerate, top with mango.
preparation.en-KE: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, refrigerate, top with mango.
preparation.en-ZA: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, refrigerate, top with mango.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1/2 cup diced papaya, 1/2 avocado, 1/2 cup water, and 1 tsp honey until smooth.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1/2 tasse de papaye en dés, 1/2 avocat, 1/2 tasse d’eau et 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Blend papaya and avocado with water and honey.
preparation.en-KE: Blend papaya and avocado with water and honey.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend papaya and avocado with water and honey.

preparation.en-NG: Dice 1/2 cup sweet potato, sauté in 1 tsp oil until tender. Add 2 beaten eggs and scramble together.
preparation.fr-CI: Coupez 1/2 tasse de patates douces en dés, faites sauter avec 1 c. à c. d’huile. Ajoutez 2 œufs battus et brouillez.
preparation.en-GH: Sauté sweet potato, scramble with eggs, serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Sauté sweet potato, scramble with eggs, serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Sauté sweet potato, scramble with eggs, serve warm.

name.fr-CI: Pudding aux Graines de Chia et Banane

preparation.en-NG: Mix 3 tbsp chia seeds with 1/2 cup almond milk. Refrigerate 4 hrs. Top with 1 sliced banana before serving.
preparation.fr-CI: Mélangez 3 c. à s. de graines de chia avec 1/2 tasse de lait d’amande. Réfrigérez 4 h. Ajoutez 1 banane tranchée avant de servir.
preparation.en-GH: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, refrigerate, top with banana.
preparation.en-KE: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, refrigerate, top with banana.
preparation.en-ZA: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, refrigerate, top with banana.

preparation.en-NG: Toast 2 slices whole wheat bread. Mash 1/2 avocado and spread on toast. Top with 1/2 cup diced mango.
preparation.fr-CI: Toastez 2 tranches de pain complet. Écrasez 1/2 avocat et étalez sur le toast. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de mangue en dés.
preparation.en-GH: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with mango.
preparation.en-KE: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with mango.
preparation.en-ZA: Toast bread, spread avocado, top with mango.

preparation.en-NG: Prepare 1 small sweet potato pancake. Fill with 1 scrambled egg and sautéed spinach. Roll and serve.
preparation.fr-CI: Préparez 1 petite crêpe de patate douce. Garnissez avec 1 œuf brouillé et des épinards sautés. Roulez et servez.
preparation.en-GH: Prepare pancake, fill with scrambled egg and spinach, roll, serve.
preparation.en-KE: Prepare pancake, fill with scrambled egg and spinach, roll, serve.
preparation.en-ZA: Prepare pancake, fill with scrambled egg and spinach, roll, serve.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1/2 cup diced pawpaw, 1/2 cup diced mango, 1/2 cup water, 1 tsp honey until smooth.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1/2 tasse de papaye en dés, 1/2 tasse de mangue en dés, 1/2 tasse d’eau, 1 c. à c. de miel.
preparation.en-GH: Blend pawpaw, mango, water and honey until smooth.
preparation.en-KE: Blend pawpaw, mango, water and honey until smooth.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend pawpaw, mango, water and honey until smooth.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1/2 cup yogurt with 2 tbsp groundnut paste. Pour into a bowl and top with 1/4 cup granola and sliced banana.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1/2 tasse de yaourt avec 2 c. à s. de pâte d’arachide. Versez dans un bol et ajoutez 1/4 tasse de granola et des tranches de banane.
preparation.en-GH: Blend yogurt with groundnut paste, top with granola and banana slices.
preparation.en-KE: Blend yogurt with groundnut paste, top with granola and banana slices.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend yogurt with groundnut paste, top with granola and banana slices.

preparation.en-NG: Sauté 1/2 cup spinach and 1/4 cup sliced mushrooms in 1 tsp oil. Add 2 beaten eggs and cook as omelette.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites sauter 1/2 tasse d’épinards et 1/4 tasse de champignons tranchés dans 1 c. à c. d’huile. Ajoutez 2 œufs battus et faites cuire en omelette.
preparation.en-GH: Sauté spinach and mushrooms, add eggs, cook omelette.
preparation.en-KE: Sauté spinach and mushrooms, add eggs, cook omelette.
preparation.en-ZA: Sauté spinach and mushrooms, add eggs, cook omelette.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup maize porridge in 1 cup water. Stir in 1 tsp moringa powder and 1/2 cup diced mango.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de bouillie de maïs avec 1 tasse d’eau. Ajoutez 1 c. à c. de poudre de moringa et 1/2 tasse de mangue en dés.
preparation.en-GH: Cook porridge, add moringa powder and mango, serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Cook porridge, add moringa powder and mango, serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook porridge, add moringa powder and mango, serve warm.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup oats in water. Top with 1/2 cup diced pawpaw and 1 tsp honey. Serve warm.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse d’avoine dans l’eau. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de papaye en dés et 1 c. à c. de miel. Servez chaud.
preparation.en-GH: Cook oats, top with pawpaw and honey, serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Cook oats, top with pawpaw and honey, serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook oats, top with pawpaw and honey, serve warm.

preparation.en-NG: Cook 1/2 cup maize pap with 1 cup water. Stir in 1/2 cup diced mango and 1/2 avocado, mash lightly.
preparation.fr-CI: Faites cuire 1/2 tasse de bouillie de maïs avec 1 tasse d’eau. Ajoutez 1/2 tasse de mangue en dés et 1/2 avocat, écrasez légèrement.
preparation.en-GH: Cook pap, stir in mango and avocado, serve warm.
preparation.en-KE: Cook pap, stir in mango and avocado, serve warm.
preparation.en-ZA: Cook pap, stir in mango and avocado, serve warm.

preparation.en-NG: Blend 1 banana, 2 tbsp groundnut paste, 1/2 cup yogurt and 1/2 cup water until smooth.
preparation.fr-CI: Mixez 1 banane, 2 c. à s. de pâte d’arachide, 1/2 tasse de yaourt et 1/2 tasse d’eau.
preparation.en-GH: Blend banana, groundnut paste, yogurt and water until smooth.
preparation.en-KE: Blend banana, groundnut paste, yogurt and water until smooth.
preparation.en-ZA: Blend banana, groundnut paste, yogurt and water until smooth.
